HEADERS.TITLE: ni
HEADERS.HEADER: NI - a leader in automated test and measurement systems
HEADERS.CONTENT:
NI - a leader in automated test and measurement systems

NI is a leader in automated test and measurement systems that help engineers solve the worldâ€™s toughest challenges.

NI offers modular hardware, software, services, and systems that help you test faster, design better, improve reliability and maximize your test data.

The product offering comprises both software and hardware solutions. Software includes LabVIEW graphical programming for application visualization, TestStand test workflow software, DIAdem measurement data management, and FlexLogger, a flexible and scalable data-logging systems building tool.

Hardware includes PXI/PCIe reconfigurable instrumentation, PXI controllers, PCIe and USB DAQ devices, oscilloscopes, digital multimeters, CompactDAQ Chassis, CompactRIO Controllers, and C Series Input and Output modules.

CompactDAQ Customizable Data Acquisition System components are now available.
